metadata.name: Potential Winnti Dropper Activity
metadata.comment: Detects files dropped by Winnti as described in RedMimicry Winnti playbook

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM file_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('3') AND (endswith(lower(file.path), lower('\\gthread-3.6.dll')) OR endswith(lower(file.path), lower('\\sigcmm-2.4.dll')) OR endswith(lower(file.path), lower('\\windows\\temp\\tmp.bat'))))

output.summary: Detects files dropped by Winnti as described in RedMimicry Winnti playbook
